|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|in|mm}} {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|mm|in}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|switch}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *Processor: [[Realtek]] RTL8380M Multi-Layer Managed Switch :Controller with Embedded MIPS 4KEc @500MHz *Co-processor: STMicro STM32F100C8 to manage PoE *Flash/RAM: 32MB (SPI NOR) Flash, 256MB RAM (DDR3) *8x Gigabit Ethernet ports *2x Gigabit SFP Slots *61.6W PoE budget
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|development}} {{OpenWrtNotice|prebuilt}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/engenius/engenius_ews2910p |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/engenius/ews2910p |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = realtek |subtarget = rtl838x |arch = mips_4kec |support_started_version = 23.05.0 |current_supported_version = auto |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
